item.title: Compiling error trying to make Welcome Screen 317 Delta
item.dc:creator: @I_am_Nick I am Nick
item.description:
@I_am_Nick wrote:

should be like this.

public void welcomeScreen() { sendQuest("Welcome to OddCreations!", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Please look through the ::commands and ::rules", 8147); sendQuest("-Highest to lowest staff members-", 8148); sendQuest("John - Creator and Owner", 8149); sendQuest("Richard - Owner", 8150); sendQuest("Mods are James and Paul", 8151); sendQuest("Players Online : "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+.", 8152); sendQuest("Information Text", 8153); sendQuest("Information Text", 8154); sendQuest("Information Text", 8155); sendQuestSomething(8146); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

	public void welcomeScreen() {
		sendQuest("Welcome to OddCreations!", 8144);
		clearQuestInterface();
		sendQuest("Please look through the ::commands and ::rules", 8147);
		sendQuest("-Highest to lowest staff members-", 8148);
		sendQuest("John - Creator and Owner", 8149);
		sendQuest("Richard - Owner", 8150);
		sendQuest("Mods are James and Paul", 8151);
		sendQuest("Players Online : "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();+".", 8152);
		sendQuest("Information Text", 8153);
		sendQuest("Information Text", 8154);
		sendQuest("Information Text", 8155);
		sendQuestSomething(8146);
		showInterface(8134);
		flushOutStream();
	}

Edit:
What’s wrong with it? Anymore errors?

item.title: Compiling error trying to make Welcome Screen 317 Delta
item.dc:creator: @john1716 john1716
item.description:
@john1716 wrote:

I was trying to make a welcome screen on delta but when I compiled it, this showed up

client.java:25627: error: class, interface, or enum expected public void welcomeScreen() { ^ client.java:25629: error: class, interface, or enum expected clearQuestInterface(); ^ client.java:25630: error: class, interface, or enum expected sendQuest("Please look through the ::commands and ::rules", 81 ); ^ client.java:25631: error: class, interface, or enum expected sendQuest("-Highest to lowest staff members-", 8148); ^ client.java:25632: error: class, interface, or enum expected sendQuest("John - Creator and Owner", 8149); ^ client.java:25633: error: class, interface, or enum expected sendQuest("Richard - Owner", 8150); ^ client.java:25634: error: class, interface, or enum expected sendQuest("Mods are James and Paul", 8151); ^ client.java:25635: error: class, interface, or enum expected sendQuest("Players Online : "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();+ ", 8152); ^ client.java:25635: error: class, interface, or enum expected sendQuest("Players Online : "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();+ ", 8152); ^ client.java:25636: error: class, interface, or enum expected sendQuest("Information Text", 8153); ^ client.java:25637: error: class, interface, or enum expected sendQuest("Information Text", 8154); ^ client.java:25638: error: class, interface, or enum expected sendQuest("Information Text", 8155); ^ client.java:25639: error: class, interface, or enum expected sendQuestSomething(8146); ^ client.java:25640: error: class, interface, or enum expected showInterface(8134); ^ client.java:25641: error: class, interface, or enum expected flushOutStream(); ^ client.java:25642: error: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ 16 errors Finished!

Read full topic
